snippet: Vladimir Krull, 37, was arrested and accused of repeatedly performing various sexual acts on a girl, now 14, from late 2013 through 2014.
abstract: New York City Police Sgt Vladimir Krull is arrested and charged with several counts of sexual assault, including rape, on Bronx minor; is charged with repeatedly performing various sexual assaults on girl, who is now 14, from 2013 through 2014.
lead_paragraph: Vladimir Krull, 37, was arrested and accused of repeatedly performing various sexual acts on a girl, now 14, from late 2013 through 2014.

headline.main: A Police Sergeant Is Charged With Sexually Assaulting a Girl
headline.print_headline: A Police Sergeant Is Charged With Sexually Assaulting a Girl
